summary: The diff appears to address the table cropping issue by making EarthquakeResultsTable support a parent-constrained “fill height” layout (flex + min-h-0 + overflow-auto) while preserving the existing virtualized rendering, which should prevent bottom clipping in both Table and Split views. No edits to shadcn/ui source files are shown in the modified-file list. However, the diff also appears to introduce/expand Moment Tensor-related UI/logic that was not requested by REQ-32.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded Moment Tensor availability logic and a dedicated "Moment Tensor" column in the results table (and related UI mentions).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-32 is strictly about fixing table layout/scrolling and explicitly lists non-goals like not redesigning columns; Moment Tensor-related UI/logic is not requested for the cropping fix.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions new Moment Tensor section in EarthquakeDetailsDialog and Moment Tensor display in table summary)
